Intuit
Hi {!Contact.FirstName}, Thanks for your time today. I enjoyed our phone conversation and especially liked learning about your firm. I understand the challenges you are facing with moving your firm to the cloud. We anticipate that almost 80% of US small businesses will be fully cloud operational by 2020, and accountants who use QBOA save on average 8 hours per client per month.¹ As promised, here are articles on five advantages of shifting to cloud technology Guide to articles here I also recommend you explore the firmofthefuture.com website. The site was designed to help you learn from key industry leaders regarding current trends. You will find content to help you work more efficiently, to better connect with your small business clients and to achieve long-term success. Please let me know if you have any questions. Otherwise, I look forward to talking with you again soon. Thanks for being a valued QuickBooks Online partner. Kind regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
